# GitHub free tools used in this project

- **Actions** (`workflows/ci.yml`): CI on push/PR — install, type-check, lint, build.
- **CodeQL** (`workflows/codeql.yml`): Free AI-powered code analysis (security & quality) for JavaScript/TypeScript.
- **Dependabot** (`dependabot.yml`): Weekly dependency and GitHub Actions updates.
- **Issue template**: Bug report form in **Issues** → New issue.
- **PR template**: Default checklist when opening a **Pull request**.

See **FREE-AI-TOOLS.md** for the full list of free AI tools (CodeQL, Copilot Autofix, etc.). All of the above are free for public repositories.
